name: Memory Palace Structure (Subjective Time)
description: Non-linear exploration of memory, time, and subjective reality where past, present, and imagined future interweave

present_anchor.name: Present Anchor
present_anchor.description: Establish a concrete present moment that serves as the anchor point for temporal journeys

memory_trigger.name: Memory Trigger
memory_trigger.description: An object, person, or sensation that opens the floodgates to the past

layered_recollection.name: Layered Recollection
layered_recollection.description: Multiple time periods exist simultaneously, memories within memories

subjective_reconstruction.name: Subjective Reconstruction
subjective_reconstruction.description: The protagonist actively reconstructs or reimagines past events

temporal_confusion.name: Temporal Confusion
temporal_confusion.description: The boundaries between past, present, and imagined future dissolve

revelation_through_repetition.name: Revelation Through Repetition
revelation_through_repetition.description: Truth emerges through repeated scenes with subtle variations

acceptance_or_madness.name: Acceptance or Madness
acceptance_or_madness.description: Protagonist either integrates the temporal experience or succumbs to confusion
